firstThreeBlogPosts.title: Building Open Domain QA system with Jina
firstThreeBlogPosts.author: Nan Wang
firstThreeBlogPosts.description: ... The solution to all of these problems is an intelligent Question Answering (QA) system. In this blog, we will discuss how to build an ODQA system from scratch with Jina.
